description: The EU Commission head, Ursula von der Leyen, delivered her maiden address. Here's what we learned.
title: Five things from EU chief¡¯s first State of the Union speech
title_page: Five things from EU chief¡¯s first State of the Union speech - BBC News
maintext: "A virus a thousand times smaller than a grain of sand exposed how delicate life can be," Mrs von der Leyen said. "The pandemic and the uncertainty that goes with it are not over and the recovery is still in its early stages."
